name: HomeConfig
0:
”Alexa, turn on bulb socket”
”Alexa, turn off bulb socket”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Home Config is a smart home skill that allow user to control multiple smart devices individually with Alexa. 

Home Config 
Step 1. Download & install "Home Config" from Apple Store or Google Play Store.
Step 2. Sign up a new account. 
Step 3. Setup a new Home Config device within the App.
Step 4. Make sure the device is controllable . 
Step 5. Go to Alexa App. for Skill setup. 

Alexa App
Step 1. Open Skill Page
Step 2. Search "Home Config"
Step 3. Click on "Home Config"
Step 4. Click Enable
Step 5. Login with Home Config account. 
Step 6. Click Discover Devices or say "Alexa, discover device"
Step 7. Check if your bind device on the list. 
Step 8. Enjoy
